Text:
Dear pooloop...

I've been using Piratebay like a sponge for a long time, never feeling the need to thank or appreciate the truly hard work of many uploaders. But, your generosity, hard work, dedication and most of DEPENDABILITY has shamed me into registering myself and putting up a comment... Dude... U rock !!! please don't stop... Die Hard man utd fans like me would be in a hell hole without ur work...
Couldnt agree with what thirdeye said anymore! Thanks very much!
And he does it again! The one and only

Ta ...........
